name: Greedy Dungeon (itch) (joniomega)
description:
Adventure yourself into the insides of a dungeon located in a forest. Find and steal tons of coins. Defend yourself and kill the enemies inside the dungeon. Experience death, and revival with the power of fire. 

This is my first game ever made. I've had no experience in making pixel art and game making so yeah I hope you enjoy it. If you find any bugs or things that should be improved let me know in the comments.

Objective:

Your objective is to break 23 golden jars and then leave the dungeon to find yourself at the end of the game. The actual game has two endings, one in whitch you get less than 23 jars and one in whitch you get them all.

Controls:

A,S,D or arrows to move.

Space or UP arrow to jump

Left Click to attack (you can attack while standing still and while running)
